A tantalizing dish made with tender strips of fluffy parotta, stir-fried with a medley of vegetables and spices. The succulent vegetables and flavorful spices are blended with the soft parotta, creating an explosion of flavors in every bite. Served hot and garnished with juicy lemon wedges, this vegetarian delight is a must-try for all food lovers!

A soft and flaky flatbread hailing from the coastal region of Malabar, in South India. Made with a blend of refined flour and oil, the parotta is expertly crafted to create its signature texture, perfect for soaking up the flavors of your favorite gravies and curries. Whether enjoyed with a spicy chicken curry or a rich, flavorful mutton masala, this parotta is a staple of South Indian cuisine and is sure to satisfy your cravings. Serve hot for the ultimate experience and taste the soft, flaky goodness of Malabar Parotta.

A traditional South Indian dish made with a fermented batter of rice and lentils. The batter is spread into a thick, pancake-like shape and topped with a variety of ingredients such as onions, tomatoes, peppers, and spices. The uttapam is then gently cooked until the toppings are tender and the bottom is crispy and golden brown. Served hot and garnished with fresh cilantro, this nutritious and delicious dish is a must-try for anyone looking to sample authentic South Indian cuisine. Whether enjoyed for breakfast, lunch, or dinner, uttapam is a treat for the senses and is sure to leave you feeling satisfied.

A traditional South Indian dish made with a fermented batter of rice and lentils. The batter is spread into a thick, pancake-like shape, uttapam is a treat for the senses and is sure to leave you feeling satisfied.

A delicious and satisfying dish that combines the soft and flaky parotta with scrambled eggs and an assortment of spices. The eggs are expertly cooked and blended with the shredded parotta, creating a unique and flavorful mix. Perfect for a hearty breakfast or a filling dinner, this dish is a real crowd-pleaser and is sure to leave you feeling satisfied. Served hot and garnished with fresh cilantro, this egg kottu parotta is a true taste of South Indian cuisine.

A mouth-watering South Indian specialty made with juicy, tender chunks of chicken and crispy, shredded parotta. The succulent chicken and fluffy parotta are stir-fried with a blend of aromatic spices, creating a tantalizing flavor that is sure to delight your taste buds. Served hot and garnished with a squeeze of lemon, this dish is the perfect balance of juicy, tender chicken and crispy, flaky parotta. Enjoy as a filling lunch or dinner, and experience the delicious taste of South Indian cuisine!

menu.description: Why cook tonight? Gather the family for an authentic Indonesian feast delivered right to your door in Roswell! Make it mild for the kids or extra spicy for the adventurous. You can set the spice level for each dish. Just write in the special instruction section! For a limited time, get this entire feast for just $55 and enjoy FREE DELIVERY on us! This exclusive deal is available for online orders only.

menu.description: 5.2%, 16oz. Known as being the beer of the people, this Saison has a light, dry body, and pours straw colored with a brilliant white foam. Mild spice notes play on the taste buds leaving a clean, refreshing finish
5.3%, 16oz. Our 2020 U.S. Open Silver Medal award-winning Belgian Witbier is brewed with lemon, orange peel, and coriander

4.6%, 16oz. Low in alcohol and refreshing for the soul, Providence is brewed with a blend of Belgian pale, pilsner malts, and a touch of wheat. What makes this beer really shine are the five continental hops that this beer is brewed with: Mittelfrh, Saaz, Styrian Goldings, Spalter Select, and Belgian Cascades. Light and delicate notes of citrus play off the Belgian spiciness of the yeast. A simple but elegant beer.
7.3%, 14oz. Our 2020 U.S. Open Gold Medal award-winning Belgian Dubbel with notes of toasted bread, brandied cherry, and caramel
8.8%, 14oz. Our 2021, 2024 U.S. Open Gold Medal award-winning Belgian Tripel boasts honeydew and citrus notes
9.7%, 14oz. Our 2023 U.S. Open Gold Medal award-winning dangerously drinkable dark Belgian Ale. Notes of raisin, cacao, and burnt sugar

9%, 14oz. Brewed to celebrate Bold Monks 5th anniversary, Rejoice! pours a beautiful pinkish-red with luscious tropical notes of citrus and rose petals with the tart sweetness of raspberries all supported by a fresh hoppiness
6.5%, .5L. Prost! Our Oktoberfest style beer. Rich and malty with just enough Saphir hops to leave you wanting more! Zum Wohl!

4.8%, 16oz. Our 2022 U.S. Open Silver Medal award-winning Mexican-style lager, this slightly amber lager drinks cleanly with balanced malt overtones that finishes crisp and dry, sure to leave your thirst quenched in the Atlanta heat
5%, 16oz. Clean and dry with a distinct note of Jasmine rice used in the mash. Hopped with Pacifica and Mandarina hops for a subtle New World hop finish
5.4%, 16oz. Our beloved dry-hopped Pilsner beer. German malt with a delicate hop spiciness

menu.item_name: ALL IS VANITY FOEDER FERMENTED SAISON
menu.description: 6% 500ml BOTTLE. Our 2023 U.S. Open Gold Medal award-winning foeder fermented with our house Saison blend and Brettanomyces Clausenii to produce subtle tropical funk notes accented perfectly with German Diamant hops
6.5% 16oz. Our 2022 U.S. Open Bronze Medal award-winning contemporary IPA with Southern Passion, Citra, Lotus, Simcoe and Azacca hops

6.8%, 16oz. In the beginning there were hops! This West Coast style IPA is where it all began. Deliciously dry and hoppy with a lingering, pleasant bitterness leaving you wanting the next sip. Brewed simply with OG hops- Centennial, Columbus, Simcoe and Amarillo

5.8%, 16oz. Just in time to quench your thirst in the Atlanta summer heat, this fruited sour exudes flavors of raspberry and blueberry added post-fermentation, coupled with the tart sensation derived from the use of Sourvisiae yeast
9.7%, 16oz. Winner of the 2024 U.S. Open Beer Championship Silver Medal, Brother Ivan is a rich, complex Imperial Stout with notes of fruit, roasted coffee, and chocolate

menu.description: A medley of traditional dishes including split peas (kik alicha), spicy red lentils (misir wot), shiro, beets, cabbage and green peas. Served with Injera.
A refreshing blend of flaked tuna mixed with crisp lettuce, tomatoes, red onions and green peppers.
Stew made with tender chunks of fish simmered in a rich sauce of slow-cooked red onions, garlic, tomato and Ethiopian spices. Seasoned with berbere and finished with a touch of spiced butter.
A creamy vegetarian stew made from chickpea flour, simmered with oil, salt, garlic, tomato and red onions. A staple of Ethiopian cuisine.
Injera pieces mixed with sauteed onions, tomatoes, green peppers and seasoned with berbere and garlic.
A refreshing mix of ripe tomatoes, crispy cucumbers, green peppers and red onions. Lightly dressed with lemon juice and olive oil and seasoned with salt and black pepper.
Seasoned with salt, garlic and pepper, breaded and fried to a golden crisp. Crispy outside, juicy inside.
Tilapia fillets coated in seasoned breading, fried in vegetable oil and served with a crunchy side salad.
Tender chopped beef sauteed with yellow onion, tomato, garlic powder, rosemary, green pepper and butter. Perfectly seasoned to deliver rich, savory and authentic Ethiopian flavor.
Medium-cut beef cooked to juicy perfection with garlic, rosemary, oil and butter. A deeply flavorful and well-balanced dish.
A traditional Ethiopian mix of finely chopped lamb stomach, liver and ribeye, seasoned with cardamom, garlic, salt, mitmita (Ethiopian cayenne pepper) and butter. Served raw, medium or well-done.
A savory blend of groud beef, cardamom, salt, mitmita, red onion and green pepper, blended with rich Ethiopian butter. Can be served raw, medium or well-done based on preference.
Chopped lamb sauteed with red onions, green pepper and butter. Choose spicy or mild.

Our tenderloin filet mignon can be enjoyed in. variety of traditional Ethiopian styles - Zilzil Tibs, featuring tender grilled beef strips seasoned with bold spices; as Derek Tibs, chopped beef sauteed to a crispy finish; as Lega Tibs, tender cuts sauteed with onions and green peppers; or as Geba Wota, a rich and flavorful Ethiopian stew.
Minced raw beef, marinated in mitmita ( a chili-based spice powder) and niter kibbeh (a clarified butter infused with herbs and spices).

Finely minced beef, seasoned with freshly ground cardamom and cayenne pepper then mixed with house-made spced Ethiopian butter (niter kibbeh). It is served with mild cottage cheese (ayib) and sauteed greens (gomen), Kocho, a dense slightly sour flatbread made from fermented enset (false banana)

Finely minced beef, seasoned with freshly ground cardamom and cayenne pepper then mixed with house-made spced Ethiopian butter (niter kibbeh). It is served with mild cottage cheese (ayib) and sauteed greens (gomen).

menu.item_name: Special Kitfo with Kocho & Ethiopian Injera
menu.description: Finely minced beef, seasoned with freshly ground cardamom and cayenne pepper then mixed with house-made spced Ethiopian butter (niter kibbeh). It is served with mild cottage cheese (ayib) and sauteed greens (gomen), Kocho, a dense slightly sour flatbread made from fermented enset (false banana) served with Ethiopian injera.

Tender beef is finely chopped and mixed with red onion, tomato, garlic and salt then blended with injera. Topped with kitfo and ayib (Ethiopian cottage cheese) and garnished with fresh green pepper for a colorful, flavorful finish.

A traditional Ethiopian delicacy made from raw, USDA-approved grass fed beef, known for its exceptional tenderness and flavor. Served fresh with cayenne pepper, hot sauce and sinafich (a spicy Ethiopian mustard or horseradish relish), offering a bold and authentic experience.

Includes your choice of Kurt, Kitfo or Dulet, Legal Tibs or Awaze Derk Tibs and Geba Wot. Served with your choice of Gomen (seasoned collard greens) or Kikil (a hearty bone-in meat stew), this combo showcases a variety of Ethiopia's finest meat dishes.
Includes everything in the Meat Combo, plus your choice of three or four traditional Ethiopian vegetarian sides - bringing balance and variety to your meal.
Finely ground beef simmered in a rich sauce of sauteed red onions, garlic and Ethiopian clarified butter (niter kibbeh). Infused with berbere (a bold Ethiopian spice blend) and abish (fenugreek).
Marinated beef strips with salt, hot pepper, rosemary and garlic, grilled to perfection.
Crispy sauteed beef, chopped and mixed with onions, salt and green peppers.
Half portion of raw beef (Kurt) with your choice of Derek Tibs or Geba Wota.
A hearty mix of beef tongue, kidney, stomach (senber), and lean meat. Slow-coked with onions, green peppers, garlic, oil, salt and rosemary. Rich in flavor and comforting.
Tender beef cooked with collard greens, onions, garlic and Ethiopian spices. A hearty and nutritious dish.
Tender lamb chunks simmered with onion, garlic, ginger and salt. A comforting and flavorful Ethiopian stew.
Tender cuts of beef sauteed with jalapenos, garlic salt,garlic powder and rosemary. Served sizzling hot in a traditional ceramic dish to keep dish warm and aromatic throughout your meal.

Ethiopian lamb stew, made with tender cuts of lamb slow-cooked in a deeply flavorful sauce of caramelized red onions, garlic, Ethiopian spiced butter (niter kibbeh) and berbere - a bold blend of chili peppers and warm spices.
Made with bone-in chicken drumsticks or thighs, this dish is slow-cooked in a rich, spicy sauce of caramelized red onions, garlic, ginger, Ethiopian spiced butter (niter kibbeh) and berbere spice.
Made with shredded injera mixed with pieces of quanta-air-dried, spiced beef. The dish is sauteed with a rich blend of berbere spice, garlic and Ethiopian spiced butter (niter kibbeh).
Pasta with Meat features tender noodles tossed in a rich, savory sauce made from perfectly seasoned ground meat, simmered tomatoes, garlic, onions and aromatic herbs.
Our Scrambled Egg Firfir combines fluffy scrambled eggs with sauted onions, tomatoes, and green peppers, seasoned with oil, salt, and black pepper.
Our Juicy Egg Firfir features slices of eggs sauted with onions, tomatoes, and hot peppers, cooked in oil for a flavorful and spicy dish.
Bite-sized beef sauteed with red onion, tomato, garlic and rosemary then seasoned with Ethiopian hot pepper and butter.
Succulent beef ribs pan-fried and marinated with Ethiopian spices including garlic, salt, rosemary and hot pepper.
A hearty dish of chickpea flour (shiro) cooked with oil, onions, tomatoes and chopped meat. Rich flavorful and comforting.
